entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Gretna
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:49 AM CDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -15.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gretna 2:00 PM CDT Friday 17 March 2023
Temperature: -15.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -29
Dewpoint: -18.4°C
Wind: NNW 52 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 12. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this evening then clearing. Blowing snow this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 near midnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 6.
